messages.subject: Penpals for the little ones
messages.msgSnippet: My 3 year old would desperately like to be just like her big sister and have a penpal.  Any takers? Any other little chidren like to get a letter just to them
messages.messageBody:
My 3 year old would desperately like to be just like her big sister and have a penpal. Any takers? Any other little chidren like to get a letter just to them in the mail? LMK, we've already got one letter written (well, mom typed it up, but I'm sure you expected that!)

Just send me your snail mail address and Tehila's missive will be off to you in no time...
email
hindar@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
